subject: Soccer
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: It is not about the money. That is what they all say, all those players, presidents and agents who spend the European summer maneuvering for transfers that mock the financial squeeze in the real world.
snippet: It is not about the money. That is what they all say, all those players, presidents and agents who spend the European summer maneuvering for transfers that mock the financial squeeze in the real world.
